column4: can someone help a newb with his first tries at a mini shell script ?  Somehow it wont work right
I am not sure if it is the script problem... that is why I am here
if your running a script and its not working - its a script problem
when I run the script, it says that I don't have permission to edit the file... but chmod is set to 777
put the script in a pastbin
http://pastebin.com/m1c384759  as I said its not much of a script... it basically is supposed to downsize all images in the folder to half the size
no, "jpg; do sudo convert blah blah"
your changing the size of all the jpeg images
Yeah that is what it should do, but the size is the same as before
run convert manually against one file then see what it does
when I do it on one file it works...
so it doesn't work to just replace the old files ?
no idea, just took a glance at the man page, the new files should be resized for you
